note: Hello Welcome to the Official Social Network Account Called Bloomify Created by Brazilians

name: About Us
value: Ours is a Brazilian Social Network and we are waiting for more members from all over to join our site. We can post new updates. We are still a small house/company. You can also participate in this Community.

name: Why did you create this network?
value: Because One Day I Was Thinking Together With My Friend About Creating A Social Network And Abandoning Others That I Already Had

name: Where Did You Choose the Name?
value: We both asked what we liked and my friend liked flowers and I liked creating so I thought and thought and came up with this idea

name: What is your test site?
value: https://connect.zoho.com/portal/intranet/myfeed
